book: 0477-Juana Skin Brightening Day Cream, Wake Me Up

chunk:
Directions: Apply Wake Me Up in the morning. Gemtly massage into your cleansed face and neck as the last step of your skincare routine.

Warnings: : for external use only. Do not use on damanged or broken skin. If contact with eyes, rinse with water to remove. Keep out of reach of children. Keep away from heat and direct sunlight.
book: 0477-Juana Skin Brightening Day Cream, Wake Me Up
